column4: alek_k, same here. i have 10.04 LTS on my work machine, where it happens.. on my home machine i have 10.10, where it doesn't happen
Is there a fix for Intel wifi cards in 10.10 yet? There was a problem with 802.11n networks..
try newer drivers « sudo apt-get install linux-backports-modules-wireless-$(lsb_release -cs)-generic »
